title: REQ: Italian Job logo font
content:
Hi all,

Racked my brains - the lower case "n" particularly is horribly familiar. I've tried whatthefont, with no luck [attempted some up-scaling but it still choked].

[http://www.italianjob.com/files/italian-job.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823022210/http:/www.italianjob.com/files/italian-job.gif "http://www.italianjob.com/files/italian-job.gif")

TIA,

n
author: nert

comments.content:
Some similarity to an obliqued rendition of Jason Walcott's [Eloquent](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823022210/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000118#specimen), which has a swash face with a similar 'n'. Eloquent is a revival of an old Didone style, Walcott says.

- Mike Yanega
